item.title: Disco Narrator - Data Formatting
item.author: 152334H
item.description: With the raw data in tow, we can construct a proper TTS Dataset with the use of a few Python scripts.

item.title: Disco Narrator - Data Scraping
item.author: 152334H
item.description:
To train an AI Text-To-Speech (TTS) model, we’ll need to obtain a Labelled Dataset with two things:

  1. Clean audio files, containing only the voice we’re cloning
  2. The dialogue transcript (text) for each audio file
